Name: Crazy Santa
About the game: If you love destructible games, then Crazy Santa will be a real boon for you. This game will give you unforgettable emotions from the destruction and chaos that takes place in the game. Destroy buildings with Christmas music and complete levels! In the third-person game Crazy Santa, you will become Santa. But putting a gift under the tree won't be easy. To do this you will have to destroy the walls of the building. You will have a pickaxe and bombs in your arsenal. Use your inventory wisely, or you can wreak havoc and smash the entire house. Get tons of fun and fun out of it! Enjoy the destruction with Christmas holiday music! Features of the game: Interesting gameplay and cool Christmas atmosphere! Intuitive interface! Complete destructibility! As many as 5 levels! Cool music!
